alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wyoming, northeastern Erie, northwestern Livingston, southeastern Niagara, southwestern Orleans and Genesee Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Middleport to near Oakfield. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lockport, Batavia, Geneseo, Darien Lakes State Park, Le Roy, Pembroke, Akron, Alden, Attica, Pavilion, Byron, Oakfield, York, Stafford, Alabama, Covington, Corfu, Elba, Alexander and Wyoming. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 48A and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Livingston; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans; Wyoming
